item.description: is first of all not a person with any edges. She has a strong middle but her boundaries are mostly fluid. She must accommodate. At first, she is expected only to be pretty. A grandmother-in-law remarks you must rouge your cheeks when the ladies of the neighborhood arrive. Then and then she must begin to give.
